newsitem.title: UK: Airtours up as Hoare Govett rates "buy".
newsitem.headline: Airtours up as Hoare Govett rates "buy".

text.p: Shares in Airtours Plc rose on Wednesday as analysts at ABN AMRO Hoare Govett issued a "buy" recommendation on the stock, dealers said.
Airtours shares, which have retreated from their record 10.51 stg set March 12, were up 15-1/2p at 970-1/2 by 1049 GMT in volume of 109,601 shares.
Analysts at Hoare Govett were not immediately available for comment.
